remarks: Polynomial evaluation builder for an exponential.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
evl1addd.q $e |- O = ( eval1 ` R ) $.
evl1addd.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
evl1addd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
evl1addd.u $e |- U = ( Base ` P ) $.
evl1addd.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
evl1addd.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
evl1addd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( M e. U /\ ( ( O ` M ) ` Y ) = V ) ) $.
evl1expd.f $e |- .xb = ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` P ) ) $.
evl1expd.e $e |- .^ = ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) $.
evl1expd.4 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
evl1expd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( N .xb M ) e. U /\ ( ( O ` ( N .xb M ) ) ` Y ) = ( N .^ V ) ) ) $.
